m_szDocTitle: Power transfer system for a rechargeable battery - Greenwave Reality, PTE Ltd.
m_szDocSumamry: Power transfer system for a rechargeable battery United States Patent 8093861 Abstract: An apparatus and method for transferring energy between a rechargeable battery and a power distribution network. The minimum final energy level may be determined at least in part from the historical energy levels and usage of the rechargeable battery. The time of day of charging the battery may be determined at least in part from information provided by the energy provider. Inventors: Christensen, Peter Wilmar (Holte, DK) Application Number: Greenwave Reality, PTE Ltd. (Singapore, SG) Primary Class: BATTERY
